articles.description: In another stellar win for the Trump administration, today the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists pushed the Doomsday Clock forward to 2 minutes from midnight. The last time the Bulletin got this grim was in 1953, after the US and USSR tested their first hydro…

articles.title: Samantha Bee says Trump aide Stephen Miller is a result of '10,000 spiders who really made a commitment'
